docs.summary: Shipping Rates services for Wix Stores

params.name: locationsInformation
params.doc: List of origins and the destination of the items to be shipped

params.name: siteProperties
params.doc: General properties that apply on this shipping rates request

docs.summary:
This endpoint will be called by the Wix Shipping Service to registered Shipping/Delivery Providers for the matched Shipping Rule,
based on the requested destination of the items being sent. For example, a Local Delivery provider might be associated to a number of shipping rules.
In case that request is invalid due to missing fields (such as zip code) or incorrect/invalid fields
such as negative weight, non-conforming format for zip code, state etc -
return this error code together with response with fields as defined in ValidationError as defined here:
https://github.com/wix-private/server-infra/blob/master/framework/grpc/README-error-handling.md#reporting-validation-exceptions

messages.name: customTextFieldsMapEntry
messages.displayName: custom Text Fields Map Entry Object

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. TODO more known properties here

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.

members.name: customProperties
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. TODO more known properties here

docs.summary: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: city
members.doc: city name

members.name: country
members.doc: country code

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: zip/postal code

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, Floor

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: subdivision (usually state or region) code according to ISO 3166-2

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: a break down of the street to number and street name

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street and number) as free text

members.name: number
members.doc: street number

members.name: name
members.doc: street name

docs.summary: This is the shipping origin for physical items being sent, in order to accurately be able to provide shipping/delivery rates

members.name: address
members.doc: Full physical address of origin

members.name: name
members.doc: Known name of origin, such as North Tel Aviv branch

members.name: price
members.doc: Amount charged for actual shipping rate

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the price - can differ from each provider, e.g US provider gives price in USD but London provider in EUR.

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other costs such as insurance, handling & packaging for fragile items etc.

members.name: type
members.doc: The reason for the additional cost

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the charge, such as 'Full Coverage Insurance of up to 80% of value of shipment'

members.name: price
members.doc: Cost of the charge

members.name: serviceOptionCode
members.doc:
Unique code of provided shipping option like "usps_std_overnight".
 For legacy calculators this would be the UUID of the option.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale)
 e.g "Standard" or "First-Class Package International" (in legacy its called "option title")

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Logistics of how delivery will be

members.name: cost
members.doc: Cost information for the rates option

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address

members.name: isBusinessLocation
members.doc: Is the pickup address the business location or not - this might effect tax calculation

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: When the item is expected to be delivered in free text, e.g "3-5 business days"

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for caller, e.g for pickup: "Ensure to come during Opening Hours, and please don't park in disabled-spot"

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Additional pickup details if it's a pickup

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item, e.g weight and dimensions

members.name: name
members.doc: Item's name

members.name: quantity
members.doc: The amount of items for that specific product

members.name: sku
members.doc: Unique Stock Keeping Unit for the item

members.name: isShippable
members.doc:
Whether the item is shippable. We provide non-shippable items since the provider might take inclusive of non-shippable items
 into account when calculating shipping

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of a single item

members.name: itemIdentifier
members.doc: Fully qualified identifier of the item

members.name: items
members.doc: Items included to be sent

members.name: locationsInformation
members.doc: List of origins and the destination of the items to be shipped

members.name: siteProperties
members.doc: General properties that apply on this shipping rates request

members.name: origin
members.doc: Origin from which the items may be shipped

members.name: destination
members.doc: Destination for items

members.name: shippingServiceOptions
members.doc: Shipping options this provider gives

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_LENGTH_UNIT - Length unit can't be classified, due to an error
  • CM - Centimeters
  • INCH - Inches

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT - Weight unit can't be classified, due to an error
  • KG - Kilograms
  • LB - Pounds
